EmailTemplate.description: ** eBay Ads Sends Email to Media Planners Queue on New Media Plan Request***
EmailTemplate.name: New Media Plan request
EmailTemplate.subject: Media Plan Request Submission:{!Media_Plan__c.CreatedBy} - {!Media_Plan__c.CreatedDate}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A Media Plan request has been submitted. Please login to your queue to review the details or Click the link to view the Media Plan request.
